news.title: New Games Added!
news.content: We've added 5 new games including Wingspan, Root, and Twilight Imperium to our collection!

news.title: Tournament Winners
news.content: Congratulations to Team Dragon for winning our monthly strategy tournament in Catan!

news.title: Game Design Workshop
news.content: Join us next weekend for a special Game Design Workshop with industry professionals!

news.title: D&D Campaign Starting
news.content: New D&D campaign starting this month! Sign up now - limited spots available.

news.title: Board Game Night Success
news.content: Thank you to everyone who attended our International Tabletop Day celebration. Over 50 participants!

news.title: Partnership Announcement
news.content: We're excited to announce our partnership with local game store 'Dice & Dragons' for exclusive member discounts!
